definitions.title: n.pr.gent.
definitions.body: Ionia(ns), Greece (Gk. )Ia/onev (i.e. orig. )I/«onev), v. also LXX infr.; OPers. Yauna Spieg:APK 237; As. Iamanu (Iavanu) Dl:Pa 248 ff. COT:Gloss; Egypt. Y:e-v:a-n-(n)a, v. WMM:369 f. cf. also 24 ff.; v. esp. on this word Sta:De Populo Javan 1880)—Ionians, as traders Ez Eze 27:13, LXX (Ella/v (named with [[תּוּבַל]], [[מֶשֶׁח]]; in v:Eze 27:12 [[תַּרְשִׁישׁ]] in v:Eze 27:14 [[תּוֹגַרְמָה]]); cf. [[יְוׇנִי]] (adj. gent.) infr.; as distant, Is 66:19, LXX (Ella/v (with [[תַּרְשִׁישׁ]], [[פּוּל]], [[לוּד]], [[תּוּבַל]] and [[הָאִיִּים הָֽרְחׂקִים]]; list to be emended fr. LXX Sta:ib. 5 ff.); called ‘son’ of Japhet Ge 10:2 (P) = 1Ch 1:5, and ‘ father ’ of [[אֱלִישָׁא]], [[תַּרְשִׁישׁ]], [[כִּתִּים]] and [[רׂדָנִים]] (so rd. for [[דׂדָנִים]]) Ge 10:4 (P) = 1Ch 1:7 (in these LXX Iwunan, v. Lag:BN 84 Anm. **); addressed (personif.) [[בָּנַיִח יׇוׇן]] Zec 9:13 (opp. [[בניך חִיּוֹן]]) LXX )/Ellhnev, and so in foll.; [[מֶלֶח יׇוׇן]] Da 8:21 (v. [[מַלְכֵי מָדַי]] [[וּפָרָָס]] v:Da 8:20) = king of Greece i.e. kingdom over which Alexander ruled, whose dominion was afterward divided (see v:Da 8:22 ff.); [[שַׂר־יׇוׇן]] Da 10:20 of the guardian-angel of Greece (v. [[שַׂר פָּרָס]] v:a); [[מַלְכוּת]] [[וְדָן]] Da 11:2 (v:b [[פָּרַׂס]]).— Ez Eze 27:19 [[וְיׇוׇן]] is text. err., v. [[וְדָן]] supr. p. 255:a.
